content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":261472,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t状況がおかしい、いっきに押され出している","translatedEnglishLine":"The situation is strange; we're being pushed back all at once."},{"lineNumber":261473,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t裏切りだーとかにげろーと総崩れになってきた","translatedEnglishLine":"They're saying 'It's a betrayal!' or 'Run away!' and the whole formation is collapsing."},{"lineNumber":261474,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tなんだ、いったい","translatedEnglishLine":"What the hell is going on?"},{"lineNumber":261475,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tかなみがちょっと見てくるといって・・すぐ戻って来た","translatedEnglishLine":"Kanami said she would go check things out... but she came back immediately."},{"lineNumber":261476,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t嘘・・ジフテリア軍が魔軍側に寝返ったって・・で、もう総崩れ","translatedEnglishLine":"No way... The Jifuteria army has switched sides to the demon army... and now everything's falling apart."},{"lineNumber":261477,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t逃げないと、ここ完全に魔軍に包囲されてしまっている","translatedEnglishLine":"We have to run; we're completely surrounded by the demon army here."},{"lineNumber":261478,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t何戦かしてボロボロのランス・・","translatedEnglishLine":"After several battles, Rance is battered and worn out..."},{"lineNumber":261479,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその前に魔人レイが現れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Then the demon lord Rei appears."},{"lineNumber":261480,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tおっと、にがさねえぜ、俺と戦え","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, you’re not getting away. Fight me!"},{"lineNumber":261481,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t・・・くそっ、とカオスを握りしめ突っ込む","translatedEnglishLine":"...Damn it, gripping Chaos tightly, he charges in."},{"lineNumber":261482,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそのまま死亡していくイメージ","translatedEnglishLine":"The image is that he dies just like that."},{"lineNumber":261483,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＜クリア＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<Clear>"},{"lineNumber":261484,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t裏路地での戦い、レイを倒します","translatedEnglishLine":"A battle in a back alley; you defeat Rei."},{"lineNumber":261485,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t倒れたレイを抱きしめるメアリー","translatedEnglishLine":"Mary embraces the fallen Rei."},{"lineNumber":261486,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t二人の関係でシーンはかわるけど、それっぽいなんか","translatedEnglishLine":"The scene changes depending on their relationship, but it’s something along those lines."},{"lineNumber":261487,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこの流れではメアリーはランスを怨まない","translatedEnglishLine":"In this scenario, Mary does not resent Rance."},{"lineNumber":261488,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t正々堂々と戦い、満足していったレイ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rei fought honorably and left satisfied."},{"lineNumber":261489,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスに対してもレイに対しても男気を感じている","translatedEnglishLine":"She feels a sense of manly spirit towards both Rance and Rei."},{"lineNumber":261490,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tじゃあね、私・・？","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, what about me...?"},{"lineNumber":261491,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t別にこの魔人と関係あるわけじゃない、何かか会っただけた","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm not really connected to this demon lord; I just happened to meet him."},{"lineNumber":261492,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t偶然最後看取ってあげる事になったけど、ま、それだけ","translatedEnglishLine":"By chance, I ended up seeing him off at the end... well, that's all."},{"lineNumber":261493,"originalJapaneseLine":"地図でＭランド表示","translatedEnglishLine":"Map displayed showing M Land."},{"lineNumber":261494,"originalJapaneseLine":"自由都市連合軍の司令部が置かれているＭランド","translatedEnglishLine":"M Land, where the Allied Free Cities Army headquarters is located."},{"lineNumber":261495,"originalJapaneseLine":"その一角にあるコンピュータールーム","translatedEnglishLine":"A computer room located in one corner of it."},{"lineNumber":261496,"originalJapaneseLine":"背景：コンピュータールーム","translatedEnglishLine":"Background: Computer room."},{"lineNumber":261497,"originalJapaneseLine":"いきなりヌヌハラ視点、今日ランスさんがこの自由都市司令部に来られる、わくわく","translatedEnglishLine":"Suddenly from Nunuhara’s perspective: Today, Rance-san is coming to this Free City headquarters — exciting!"},{"lineNumber":261498,"originalJapaneseLine":"自己回想・・どうしてここにいるのかうんぬん","translatedEnglishLine":"Self-reflection... about why I am here, and so on."},{"lineNumber":261499,"originalJapaneseLine":"そしてランスと出会う、失神","translatedEnglishLine":"Then she meets Rance and faints."},{"lineNumber":261500,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ユーザーにはヌヌハラ解説でおなじみだが、ここで始めてこの子がゲーム内のキャラと分かる","translatedEnglishLine":"(Familiar to users from Nunuhara's explanations, but here the player first realizes this girl is a character within the game.)"},{"lineNumber":261501,"originalJapaneseLine":"Ｍランドに到着したランス達","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others arrive at M Land."},{"lineNumber":261502,"originalJapaneseLine":"（今回は　ＣＩＴＹ−現地への移動は省く）","translatedEnglishLine":"(This time, skipping CITY — movement to the site.)"},{"lineNumber":261503,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリア、志津香、コパンドン、セシル、（篠田はもういなくていいかな）","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria, Shizuka, Kopandon, Cecil, (maybe Shinohara isn't needed anymore)."},{"lineNumber":261504,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦況の様子を聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"They ask about the current battle situation."},{"lineNumber":261505,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍と自由都市軍は、あちらこちらで小競り合い、前回のセキガハラのような","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army and Free City forces are skirmishing here and there, but no major battles like the last Sekigahara."},{"lineNumber":261506,"originalJapaneseLine":"大きな戦闘は起こってはいない","translatedEnglishLine":"There have been no large-scale battles."},{"lineNumber":261507,"originalJapaneseLine":"新型のチューリップ３号Ｈ型１０両が戦線に投入されて大活躍","translatedEnglishLine":"Ten new Type H Tulip No.3 tanks were deployed to the front and performed excellently."},{"lineNumber":261508,"originalJapaneseLine":"しばらく勝ちまくっていたのだけど・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"They were winning repeatedly for a while, but..."},{"lineNumber":261509,"originalJapaneseLine":"それはどうでもいい、俺が倒すべきは魔人だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"That doesn't matter; the one I must defeat is the demon lord."},{"lineNumber":261510,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人は現れたのか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Has the demon lord appeared?"},{"lineNumber":261511,"originalJapaneseLine":"うん、魔人パイアールが現れて、チューリップ３号に似たような戦車を","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah, demon lord Paiar appeared and sent out tanks similar to the Tulip No.3."},{"lineNumber":261512,"originalJapaneseLine":"繰り出してきてチューリップ３号が次々と撃破されている","translatedEnglishLine":"They went on the offensive and the Tulip No.3 tanks have been destroyed one after another."},{"lineNumber":261513,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの時、見られて技術をパクられたんだ−と泣くマリア","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria cries, saying 'At that time, they saw and stole our technology.'"},{"lineNumber":261514,"originalJapaneseLine":"パイアールは、神出鬼没というより、チューリップ３号狙いで最近現れていたけ","translatedEnglishLine":"Paiar has been appearing recently targeting the Tulip No.3 tanks rather than being truly elusive."},{"lineNumber":261515,"originalJapaneseLine":"が、こちらがそれを恐れて３号出さなくなったら来なくなっている。","translatedEnglishLine":"But when we got afraid and stopped deploying the No.3 tanks, he stopped showing up."},{"lineNumber":261516,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんな状況","translatedEnglishLine":"That's the current situation."},{"lineNumber":261517,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":261518,"originalJapaneseLine":"チューリップ３号はまだあるのか、後２台だけ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Are there any Tulip No.3 tanks left? Only two more..."},{"lineNumber":261519,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、作戦は決まったな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, the plan is decided."},{"lineNumber":261520,"originalJapaneseLine":"いやがるマリアをねじふせて、残ったチューリップ３号２台を連れ出す","translatedEnglishLine":"He forces the reluctant Maria and takes the remaining two Tulip No.3 tanks with him."},{"lineNumber":261521,"originalJapaneseLine":"へっぽこ街道を進む","translatedEnglishLine":"They proceed down the rough highway."},{"lineNumber":261522,"originalJapaneseLine":"街道を移動中","translatedEnglishLine":"Moving along the highway."},{"lineNumber":261523,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリアとの話・・、チューリップ３号Ｈ型は２台引き連れている","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation with Maria... they're escorting two Type H Tulip No.3 tanks."},{"lineNumber":261524,"originalJapaneseLine":"チューリップ３号大事、なでなで・・姉妹が殺されて可哀想","translatedEnglishLine":"The Tulip No.3 tanks are precious, patting them... it's sad their sisters were killed."},{"lineNumber":261525,"originalJapaneseLine":"君達はだけは守るからねと","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll protect only you guys."},{"lineNumber":261526,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリアのより、パイアールの方が強いのかとランスが聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance asks Maria if Paiar is stronger."},{"lineNumber":261527,"originalJapaneseLine":"火力は負けているかも・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe their firepower is inferior..."},{"lineNumber":261528,"originalJapaneseLine":"装甲も負けているかも・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe their armor is inferior too..."},{"lineNumber":261529,"originalJapaneseLine":"機動性も負けているかも・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe their mobility is also inferior..."},{"lineNumber":261530,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも、かっこよさと可愛さは勝っているもん","translatedEnglishLine":"But, in coolness and cuteness, they win for sure!"},{"lineNumber":261531,"originalJapaneseLine":"パイアールについて、サテラの情報","translatedEnglishLine":"Information from Satella about Paiar."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 状況がおかしい、いっきに押され出している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The situation is strange; we're being pushed back all at once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裏切りだーとかにげろーと総崩れになってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're saying 'It's a betrayal!' or 'Run away!' and the whole formation is collapsing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、いったい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What the hell is going on?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみがちょっと見てくるといって・・すぐ戻って来た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami said she would go check things out... but she came back immediately.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嘘・・ジフテリア軍が魔軍側に寝返ったって・・で、もう総崩れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way... The Jifuteria army has switched sides to the demon army... and now everything's falling apart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げないと、ここ完全に魔軍に包囲されてしまっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have to run; we're completely surrounded by the demon army here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何戦かしてボロボロのランス・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After several battles, Rance is battered and worn out...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その前に魔人レイが現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then the demon lord Rei appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっと、にがさねえぜ、俺と戦え
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, you’re not getting away. Fight me!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・くそっ、とカオスを握りしめ突っ込む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Damn it, gripping Chaos tightly, he charges in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま死亡していくイメージ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The image is that he dies just like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜クリア＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Clear>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裏路地での戦い、レイを倒します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A battle in a back alley; you defeat Rei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒れたレイを抱きしめるメアリー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mary embraces the fallen Rei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人の関係でシーンはかわるけど、それっぽいなんか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The scene changes depending on their relationship, but it’s something along those lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この流れではメアリーはランスを怨まない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this scenario, Mary does not resent Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正々堂々と戦い、満足していったレイ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rei fought honorably and left satisfied.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに対してもレイに対しても男気を感じている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She feels a sense of manly spirit towards both Rance and Rei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃあね、私・・？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, what about me...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別にこの魔人と関係あるわけじゃない、何かか会っただけた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not really connected to this demon lord; I just happened to meet him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 偶然最後看取ってあげる事になったけど、ま、それだけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By chance, I ended up seeing him off at the end... well, that's all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図でＭランド表示
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Map displayed showing M Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合軍の司令部が置かれているＭランド
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M Land, where the Allied Free Cities Army headquarters is located.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その一角にあるコンピュータールーム
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A computer room located in one corner of it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：コンピュータールーム
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Computer room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いきなりヌヌハラ視点、今日ランスさんがこの自由都市司令部に来られる、わくわく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly from Nunuhara’s perspective: Today, Rance-san is coming to this Free City headquarters — exciting!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自己回想・・どうしてここにいるのかうんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Self-reflection... about why I am here, and so on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてランスと出会う、失神
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then she meets Rance and faints.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ユーザーにはヌヌハラ解説でおなじみだが、ここで始めてこの子がゲーム内のキャラと分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Familiar to users from Nunuhara's explanations, but here the player first realizes this girl is a character within the game.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランドに到着したランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others arrive at M Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （今回は　ＣＩＴＹ−現地への移動は省く）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (This time, skipping CITY — movement to the site.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリア、志津香、コパンドン、セシル、（篠田はもういなくていいかな）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria, Shizuka, Kopandon, Cecil, (maybe Shinohara isn't needed anymore).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦況の様子を聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They ask about the current battle situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍と自由都市軍は、あちらこちらで小競り合い、前回のセキガハラのような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army and Free City forces are skirmishing here and there, but no major battles like the last Sekigahara.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きな戦闘は起こってはいない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There have been no large-scale battles.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新型のチューリップ３号Ｈ型１０両が戦線に投入されて大活躍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ten new Type H Tulip No.3 tanks were deployed to the front and performed excellently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらく勝ちまくっていたのだけど・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were winning repeatedly for a while, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはどうでもいい、俺が倒すべきは魔人だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That doesn't matter; the one I must defeat is the demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人は現れたのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Has the demon lord appeared?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うん、魔人パイアールが現れて、チューリップ３号に似たような戦車を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, demon lord Paiar appeared and sent out tanks similar to the Tulip No.3.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 繰り出してきてチューリップ３号が次々と撃破されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They went on the offensive and the Tulip No.3 tanks have been destroyed one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時、見られて技術をパクられたんだ−と泣くマリア
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria cries, saying 'At that time, they saw and stole our technology.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールは、神出鬼没というより、チューリップ３号狙いで最近現れていたけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Paiar has been appearing recently targeting the Tulip No.3 tanks rather than being truly elusive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、こちらがそれを恐れて３号出さなくなったら来なくなっている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But when we got afraid and stopped deploying the No.3 tanks, he stopped showing up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな状況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's the current situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チューリップ３号はまだあるのか、後２台だけ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are there any Tulip No.3 tanks left? Only two more...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、作戦は決まったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, the plan is decided.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いやがるマリアをねじふせて、残ったチューリップ３号２台を連れ出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He forces the reluctant Maria and takes the remaining two Tulip No.3 tanks with him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へっぽこ街道を進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They proceed down the rough highway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街道を移動中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moving along the highway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアとの話・・、チューリップ３号Ｈ型は２台引き連れている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation with Maria... they're escorting two Type H Tulip No.3 tanks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チューリップ３号大事、なでなで・・姉妹が殺されて可哀想
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Tulip No.3 tanks are precious, patting them... it's sad their sisters were killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君達はだけは守るからねと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll protect only you guys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアのより、パイアールの方が強いのかとランスが聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance asks Maria if Paiar is stronger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火力は負けているかも・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe their firepower is inferior...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 装甲も負けているかも・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe their armor is inferior too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 機動性も負けているかも・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe their mobility is also inferior...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、かっこよさと可愛さは勝っているもん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, in coolness and cuteness, they win for sure!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールについて、サテラの情報
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information from Satella about Paiar.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 状況がおかしい、いっきに押され出している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The situation is strange; we're being pushed back all at once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裏切りだーとかにげろーと総崩れになってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're saying 'It's a betrayal!' or 'Run away!' and the whole formation is collapsing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、いったい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What the hell is going on?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみがちょっと見てくるといって・・すぐ戻って来た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami said she would go check things out... but she came back immediately.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嘘・・ジフテリア軍が魔軍側に寝返ったって・・で、もう総崩れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way... The Jifuteria army has switched sides to the demon army... and now everything's falling apart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げないと、ここ完全に魔軍に包囲されてしまっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have to run; we're completely surrounded by the demon army here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何戦かしてボロボロのランス・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After several battles, Rance is battered and worn out...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その前に魔人レイが現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then the demon lord Rei appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっと、にがさねえぜ、俺と戦え
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, you’re not getting away. Fight me!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・くそっ、とカオスを握りしめ突っ込む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Damn it, gripping Chaos tightly, he charges in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま死亡していくイメージ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The image is that he dies just like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜クリア＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Clear>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裏路地での戦い、レイを倒します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A battle in a back alley; you defeat Rei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒れたレイを抱きしめるメアリー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mary embraces the fallen Rei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人の関係でシーンはかわるけど、それっぽいなんか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The scene changes depending on their relationship, but it’s something along those lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この流れではメアリーはランスを怨まない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this scenario, Mary does not resent Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正々堂々と戦い、満足していったレイ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rei fought honorably and left satisfied.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに対してもレイに対しても男気を感じている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She feels a sense of manly spirit towards both Rance and Rei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃあね、私・・？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, what about me...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別にこの魔人と関係あるわけじゃない、何かか会っただけた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not really connected to this demon lord; I just happened to meet him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 偶然最後看取ってあげる事になったけど、ま、それだけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By chance, I ended up seeing him off at the end... well, that's all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図でＭランド表示
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Map displayed showing M Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合軍の司令部が置かれているＭランド
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M Land, where the Allied Free Cities Army headquarters is located.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その一角にあるコンピュータールーム
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A computer room located in one corner of it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：コンピュータールーム
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Computer room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いきなりヌヌハラ視点、今日ランスさんがこの自由都市司令部に来られる、わくわく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly from Nunuhara’s perspective: Today, Rance-san is coming to this Free City headquarters — exciting!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自己回想・・どうしてここにいるのかうんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Self-reflection... about why I am here, and so on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてランスと出会う、失神
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then she meets Rance and faints.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ユーザーにはヌヌハラ解説でおなじみだが、ここで始めてこの子がゲーム内のキャラと分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Familiar to users from Nunuhara's explanations, but here the player first realizes this girl is a character within the game.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランドに到着したランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others arrive at M Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （今回は　ＣＩＴＹ−現地への移動は省く）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (This time, skipping CITY — movement to the site.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリア、志津香、コパンドン、セシル、（篠田はもういなくていいかな）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria, Shizuka, Kopandon, Cecil, (maybe Shinohara isn't needed anymore).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦況の様子を聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They ask about the current battle situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍と自由都市軍は、あちらこちらで小競り合い、前回のセキガハラのような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army and Free City forces are skirmishing here and there, but no major battles like the last Sekigahara.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きな戦闘は起こってはいない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There have been no large-scale battles.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新型のチューリップ３号Ｈ型１０両が戦線に投入されて大活躍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ten new Type H Tulip No.3 tanks were deployed to the front and performed excellently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらく勝ちまくっていたのだけど・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were winning repeatedly for a while, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはどうでもいい、俺が倒すべきは魔人だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That doesn't matter; the one I must defeat is the demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人は現れたのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Has the demon lord appeared?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うん、魔人パイアールが現れて、チューリップ３号に似たような戦車を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, demon lord Paiar appeared and sent out tanks similar to the Tulip No.3.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 繰り出してきてチューリップ３号が次々と撃破されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They went on the offensive and the Tulip No.3 tanks have been destroyed one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時、見られて技術をパクられたんだ−と泣くマリア
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria cries, saying 'At that time, they saw and stole our technology.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールは、神出鬼没というより、チューリップ３号狙いで最近現れていたけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Paiar has been appearing recently targeting the Tulip No.3 tanks rather than being truly elusive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、こちらがそれを恐れて３号出さなくなったら来なくなっている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But when we got afraid and stopped deploying the No.3 tanks, he stopped showing up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな状況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's the current situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チューリップ３号はまだあるのか、後２台だけ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are there any Tulip No.3 tanks left? Only two more...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、作戦は決まったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, the plan is decided.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いやがるマリアをねじふせて、残ったチューリップ３号２台を連れ出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He forces the reluctant Maria and takes the remaining two Tulip No.3 tanks with him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へっぽこ街道を進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They proceed down the rough highway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街道を移動中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moving along the highway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアとの話・・、チューリップ３号Ｈ型は２台引き連れている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation with Maria... they're escorting two Type H Tulip No.3 tanks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チューリップ３号大事、なでなで・・姉妹が殺されて可哀想
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Tulip No.3 tanks are precious, patting them... it's sad their sisters were killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君達はだけは守るからねと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll protect only you guys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアのより、パイアールの方が強いのかとランスが聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance asks Maria if Paiar is stronger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火力は負けているかも・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe their firepower is inferior...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 装甲も負けているかも・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe their armor is inferior too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 機動性も負けているかも・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe their mobility is also inferior...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、かっこよさと可愛さは勝っているもん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, in coolness and cuteness, they win for sure!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールについて、サテラの情報
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information from Satella about Paiar.
